DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Bimosiamose Cream is safe and effective in the treatment of plaque type psoriasis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Bimosiamose Cream to Treat Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of plaque type psoriasis PASI score of 515 At least 18 years of age Written informed consent Active skin infection More than 20% Body Surface Area (BSA) affected by psoriasis Use of certain antipsoriasis medication or treatments
